Content.Text: Good evening mortals. The TCU Halloween Challenge 2025 Discord event has concluded!

Thank you to everyone for your submissions and votes, this was really fun! 
 Based on the votes, we have chosen the Top 4 submissions. Let's go from Bronze to Platinum:
BRONZE - by @fratotof

At #4 - we have fratotof's submission. A wide shot of the town of Salem in the East Coast, where halloween never ends. In the middle of the town road is a frrrrreaakyy Hot Rod - you sure wouldn't want to be stopped by someone driving such a vehicle in the middle of the night, they're probably f#$%ing crazy! What are they gonna do? Pull a gun out on you and say "Trick or Treat"? Damn, I guess Dayton got tricked.
> Link to the submission on Discord
SILVER - by @notactuallybarackobama

At #3 - we have Benny's submission. Looks like Alex is giving a ride to the local resident of the Church early in the morning - they've been up all night scaring crows (and children). Actually jokes aside, damn, that's one huge scarecrow! I like his sense of style though.
> Link to the submission on Discord
GOLD - by @ejb2000
At #2 - we have EvanJB19's submission. Looks like the other side of Salem. Damn, this one's a hell of a lot more sinister than the submission by fratotof... Red + darkness = scary!
> Link to the submission on Discord
PLATINUM - by @wolfgaming0522

At #1 - we have Wolf Gaming's submission. Darkness - check, church - check, graveyard - check, creepy giant scarecrow - check, the autumn woods of the East Coast - check, creepy building at the back with a red porch light - check! You can hardly get any more halloweeny than this! Well deserved Platinum. 
 Wolf Gaming is now crowned the KING OF HALLOWEEN 2025! Congratulations!
> Link to the submission on Discord
HONORABLE MENTION - by @reale_stone

Would be unfair of me not to mention this one by reale_stone, as it's actually the highest voted submission of all (at 49 votes), but it's a joke submission so it can't make it onto the main list. So what do we have here... Windows XP Notepad commenting over what is presumably an old YouTube video, an "Unregistered HyperCam2" watermark in the top left corner, and I can already hear that 009 sound system song playing over this. I really like the desaturation and subtle noise over the game window specifically... makes it a bit eerie, juxtaposed to the joke text written in the notepad...
> Link to the submission on Discord

That concludes the TCU Halloween Challenge of 2025! Thank you again to everyone for participating, we appreciate everyone who voted on and submitted their entries! 

 Congratulations to Wolf Gaming for getting Platinum and winning the challenge! You now get a fancy role on the Discord and bragging rights!
Now, Christmas is coming up next... perhaps we'll do something like this for it!
> Join the TCU Discord
- whammy4
